title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4104.11 - Recording conversation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4104.11 - Recording conversation

State Regulations

All telephone conversations into and from the paddock
shall be recorded from the time pari-mutuel sales are begun until the last
horse has left the paddock. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4104.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
